text: Information systems (IS) is the study of how people put data into computers to create useful information. There are five things you need to make an information system work: *People - People that are using these computers to do their jobs. *Procedures - The things people have to DO to do their jobs. *Hardware - The actual computers that people use to store facts. *Software - The instructions on these computer screens that tell you how to enter facts into the computer. *Data - Facts, facts, and more facts in the computer. ==Related pages== * Information technology ==References== Category:Knowledge Category:Computing
title: Information systems
